body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to XYZ Hotel Customer Support. My name is Elijah Howard. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Elijah, my name is Nancy Gray.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Nancy. How may I assist you today? To better assist you, can you provide me with your room number and the date of your stay?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my room number is two four six and I stayed on the seventh of October.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, Nancy. I understand the importance of a pleasant stay. Could you also share your contact number so we can follow up with you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, sure. My contact number is five five five - three three three - four four four four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Nancy, for sharing that with me. We will look into the issues you've experienced. Is there anything else you would like to add?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. I hope the concerns can be addressed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your patience, Nancy. We appreciate your feedback and will work to improve our services. Have a great day!
